Data Fields
bootloader_info_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Bootloader Access

Bootloader attributes. More...

#include <bootloader.h>

Detailed Description

This structure contains the attributes for the bootloader.

Data Fields

u32 version
 The bootloader version.
 
u32 serialno [4]
 The device serial number.
 
u32 startaddr
 The start address of the target program (read-only)
 
u32 hardware_id
 The hardware ID of the bootloader (must match image)
